action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi there,

Can you do the list of things below:

1. Remove the Online mat schedule on home page, replace with this Merry Christmas picture and the paragraph

Lively Physio & Pilates would like to thank our clients and the community for supporting us through another crazy year! We will be open for physio appointments over Christmas and New Years. Pilates will resume from 5th Jan and massage will resume from 4th Jan. We wish you a Merry Christmas and we look forward to seeing you all in 2022!

Take a look at my Canva design! https://canva.me/8SjPvawLTlb

2. Change the wording on home page
We are open again! PEP/SP classes are back, mat pilates will continue online indefinitely. Read more about our COVID-19 precautions.

To

We are open for all our services. Our services are Physiotherapy, Remedial Massage and equipment studio Pilates. We are no longer offering Mat Pilates classes. Read more about our COVID-19 precautions.

3. Pilates Page.

Change content to

We provide StudioPilates sessions. Small group of 3 using traditional pilates equipment.

Benefits of Pilates

  • Reduced neck and lower back pain
  • Increased postural awareness and correction Muscle re-programming to enable you to move and hold yourself more efficiently
  • Improved flexibility
  • Improved core strength and spinal stability
  • Reduced risk of injury from work and sport
  • Better balance and reduced risk of falls
  • Increased bone density
  • Body re-shaping - a flatter and more toned abdomen and improved muscle definition

Why do Pilates with us:

  • All pilates instructors are qualified graduates from international teaching schools including Polestar Pilates International, APPI.
  • Small groups of 3 for StudioPilates equipment sessions
  • Fully equipped studio: reformers, trapeze table, combo-chairs, ladder barrels, spine correctors, and other small apparatus including chi balls, Oov, pilates circle, theraband, balance beams, dumb bells, swiss balls and more...


Before starting a StudioPilates session at Lively, it is a requirement that you attend a 60 minute Initial Pilates Assessment with one of our physiotherapists. This includes a Real-Time Ultrasound assessment for your core muscles.

Following your assessment, a mandatory 1-2 private pilates sessions will need to take place to ensure your goals, strengths and compensations have been identified, understand all safety procedures for the use of the equipment and leave with an individualised program for home and/or equipment session. If you have done pilates elsewhere before, you will still need to do an initial assessment and private session/s.


All StudioPilates sessions are by appointment only. Bookings are essential. For prices, please contact admin. As all Pilates sessions are by appointment and small in size, we have a 24 hour cancellation policy where the 100% of the fee will be charged if a session is cancelled with less than 24 hour notice. This also applies to cases of 'no-show'. To secure a regular weekly spot, a pack of 5 or 10 must be purchased. Booking on a casual basis is also an option. These sessions and classes are non-claimable with your private health insurance as per the new governmental regulations from 1st April 2019.

Remove everything below Online Mat classes and the picture too.

4. Change title from Pilates to StudioPilates under the services drop down

5. Attach the new schedule to PEP and StudioPilates pages

6. Remove Ballet Barre content on the Other Classes page.

7. Email address. If you could add the below somehow?

admin@livelyphysio.com.au - for all enquiries and bookings

Email address therapist@livelyphysio.com.au - communication for existing clients only to our therapists.



Thank you.

Regards,

Sylvia
